meanings.definition: The act of making a dent or indentation.
meanings.sent1: She accidentally created a dentation on the car door when she bumped into it.
meanings.sent2: The dentation on the metal surface was caused by a heavy object falling on it.
meanings.sent3: The dentation on the cake made it look like a smiley face.
meanings.sent4: The dentation on the paper was a map of her journey through the forest of words.
meanings.sent5: The dentation on the clay sculpture added a unique texture to the artwork.

meanings.definition: A series of dents or indentations.
meanings.sent1: The dentation on the wall showed a pattern of small impacts.
meanings.sent2: The dentation along the edge of the table indicated years of use.
meanings.sent3: The dentation on the cookie sheet resembled a constellation of stars.
meanings.sent4: The dentation on the path of the garden stones guided her way through the maze.
meanings.sent5: The dentation on the tree trunk told the story of woodpeckers searching for insects.

meanings.definition: The state of being dented or indented.
meanings.sent1: The dentation of the metal showed signs of wear and tear.
meanings.sent2: The dentation on the soft clay was evidence of the sculptor's touch.
meanings.sent3: The dentation on the pillow made it a perfect fit for her head.
meanings.sent4: The dentation on the sandy beach was like a secret code left by the waves.
meanings.sent5: The dentation on the wooden floor added character to the old house.
